complexion: Full coverage white foundation, creating a stark contrast with the natural skin tone. No visible blush, contour, or highlight.
eyes: Red eyeshadow applied heavily around the eyes, extending towards the temples. No visible mascara. Brows are natural and dark.
lips: Bright red lipstick with a satin finish, precisely applied to create a defined lip shape.
overall_style: Traditional Geisha makeup, characterized by its stark white face, red accents, and emphasis on the eyes and lips.
